item.title: Template Posting
item.description:
<h2 id="stuff" class="heading-element"><span>Stuff</span>
 <a href="#stuff" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><a href="http://localhost:1313/posts/">index</a></p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="http://localhost:1313/posts/test/images/test.png" alt="test.png" srcset="http://localhost:1313/posts/test/images/test.png?size=small, http://localhost:1313/posts/test/images/test.png?size=medium 1.5x, http://localhost:1313/posts/test/images/test.png?size=large 2x" data-title="test.png" style="--width: 874px;--aspect-ratio: 874 / 473;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>Testing <strong>bold</strong></p>
<div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" style="color:#f8f8f2;background-color:#272822;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4;"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#66d9ef">def</span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">hi</span>(stuff: str) <span style="color:#f92672">-&gt;</span> <span style="color:#66d9ef">None</span>:
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> print(<span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;Hello World&#34;</span>)</span></span></code></pre></div>
